messages.title: Chris Nicholson will deliver change for our area
messages.content: Chris Nicholson can beat Labour. Labour took Streatham for granted. Chris offers a change from Labour's 38 years of failure. Voters have delivered 1000s of Liberal Democrat victories on a scale that can outstrip the Conservative third in the last general election.

messages.title: A record of action
messages.content: Chris has worked with local businesses to invest in the Streatham Ice Rink.

messages.title: Protecting local services
messages.content: Chris has judged at local dog shows, thereby showing his commitment to local services and issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris Nicholson wants to put more money back into the pocket of Streatham constituents.
Chris is committed to fighting crime, emphasizing more police.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The best start in life for our children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris aims to give the best start in life for children by investing in schools and education.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Gordon Brown and Labour have failed.
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's so close in our area. The Lib Dems can win here. Labour can't win nationwide and the Tories can't win here.

housing.content: Chris has worked with local businesses to invest in the Streatham Ice Rink, judging at local dog shows.

images.caption: Chris Nicholson at the local Streatham Ice Rink with supportive community members.
